task.title: Configure your web server with the authorization token

step.cmd: Follow the steps in to set up a web server that hosts your authorization token.
Copy the provided token, found in samples/PrimetimeReference/src/token/hlsaf_localhost.dat, to your web root folder under /token/hlsaf_localhost.dat.
step.info: The token must be accessible from http://localhost/token/hlsaf_localhost.dat.

taskbody.result:
If you want to host the token in a different location, you can change the location of where the tests will load the authorization token by editing the configuration file source/ReferenceCoreTest/ReferenceCoreTest-build-config.xml.
Change the server where the token is hosted by editing the value of parameter CONFIG::LoaderURL.
Change the path where the token is found by editing the value of parameter CONFIG::TokenURL.
CONFIG::TokenURL must begin with a forward-slash (/).
